message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
